QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(INSTANCE), HOSTNAME, SUBSTR((LTRIM(SUBSTR(FLAGS, (INSTR(FLAGS, '-p') + 2)))), 1, (INSTR((LTRIM(SUBSTR(FLAGS, (INSTR(FLAGS, '-p') + 2)))), ' ') - 1)), LASTWAKETIME, RETRYCOUNT, CONFIGSET FROM ODS.ODS_PROCESS WHERE SERVERID = (SELECT SERVERID FROM ODS.ODS_SERVERS WHERE SERVERNAME='OIDLDAPD')

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), AVG(AT2.ATTRVAL), MIN(AT3.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclqueuedepth' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'work' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclqueuelatency' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'work' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT3.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclhealthstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), MIN(AT2.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclopenconn' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'tcp' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT2.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclhealthstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT2.ATTRVAL), MIN(AT3.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclopenconn' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'db' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclactiveconn' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'db' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT3.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclhealthstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

Display.Label: (Historical Resource Statistics)LDAP Server and System Memory

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, AVG(AT1.ATTRVAL), AVG(AT2.ATTRVAL), MIN(AT3.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclserveravgmemgrowth' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'oid' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orcltotfreephymem' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'totfreephymem' AND AT3.ATTRNAME='orclentrydn' AND AT3.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclhealthstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT2.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT3.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT4.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT5.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT6.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT7.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT8.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT9.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT10.ATTRVAL), MIN(AT11.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT4, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT5, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT6, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT7, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT8, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT9, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT10, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT11 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=AT5.ENTRYID AND AT5.ENTRYID=AT6.ENTRYID AND AT6.ENTRYID=AT7.ENTRYID AND AT7.ENTRYID=AT8.ENTRYID AND AT8.ENTRYID=AT9.ENTRYID AND AT9.ENTRYID=AT10.ENTRYID AND AT10.ENTRYID=AT11.ENTRYID AND AT11.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'bind' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'add' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE = 'delete' AND AT4.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT4.ATTRSTYPE = 'modify' AND AT5.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT5.ATTRSTYPE = 'search' AND AT6.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT6.ATTRSTYPE = 'compare' AND AT7.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT7.ATTRSTYPE = 'abandon' AND AT8.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT8.ATTRSTYPE = 'unbind' AND AT9.ATTRNAME = 'orclopcompleted' AND AT9.ATTRSTYPE = 'modrdn' AND AT10.ATTRNAME = 'orclopfailed' AND AT10.ATTRSTYPE = 'bind' AND AT11.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT11.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclgeneralstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, PR.ATTRVALUE, TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS'), AT1.ATTRVAL, AT2.ATTRVAL, AT3.ATTRVAL, AT4.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPPROCESSID PR, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT4 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=PR.ENTRYID AND PR.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orcleventtype' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclopresult' AND AT3.ATTRNAME='orcluserdn' AND AT4.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT4.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclsecrefreshevents%' ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, PR.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, UPPER(SUBSTR(AT1.ATTRNAME, 5)), AT1.ATTRVAL, AT2.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPPROCESSID PR, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=PR.ENTRYID AND PR.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND ( (AT1.ATTRNAME='orclora3113error') OR (AT1.ATTRNAME='orclora3114error') ) AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT2.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclsysresourceevents%' ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, PR.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, AVG(DECODE((AT1.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT1.ATTRVAL))), AVG(DECODE((AT2.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT2.ATTRVAL))), AVG(DECODE((AT3.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT3.ATTRVAL))), MIN(AT4.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT4 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'bind' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'compare' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE = 'search_mesg' AND AT4.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT4.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclperfstats%' GROUP BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE
SELECT DISTINCT ATTRVALUE FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID ORDER BY ATTRVALUE

Display.Label: Running instances of LDAP Replication Server

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(INSTANCE), CONCAT (HOSTNAME, CONCAT ( ':', SUBSTR((LTRIM(SUBSTR(FLAGS, (INSTR(FLAGS, '-p') + 2)))), 1, (INSTR((LTRIM(SUBSTR(FLAGS, (INSTR(FLAGS, '-p') + 2)))), ' ') - 1)))), TO_CHAR(CONFIGSET), TO_CHAR(LASTWAKETIME, 'DD MON YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(RETRYCOUNT) FROM ODS.ODS_PROCESS WHERE SERVERID = (SELECT SERVERID FROM ODS.ODS_SERVERS WHERE SERVERNAME='OIDREPLD')

SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(AT1.ATTRVAL, 9), AT2.ATTRVAL, AT3.ATTRVAL FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE AT4 WHERE AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_TOMBSTONE WHERE MOD_TIME IN ( ( SELECT MAX(MOD_TIME) FROM ODS.CT_TOMBSTONE WHERE RDN LIKE 'cn=instance%' AND PARENTDN LIKE '%subregistrysubentry%osdldapd%' AND SUBSTR(RDN, LENGTH(RDN)) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT INSTANCE FROM ODS.ODS_PROCESS WHERE SERVERID = ( SELECT DISTINCT SERVERID FROM ODS.ODS_SERVERS WHERE SERVERNAME='OIDLDAPD' ) ) GROUP BY RDN ) UNION ( SELECT MAX(MOD_TIME) FROM ODS.CT_TOMBSTONE WHERE RDN LIKE 'cn=instance%' AND PARENTDN LIKE '%subregistrysubentry%osdldapd%' AND SUBSTR(RDN, LENGTH(RDN)) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT INSTANCE FROM ODS.ODS_PROCESS WHERE STATE != 2 AND SERVERID = ( SELECT DISTINCT SERVERID FROM ODS.ODS_SERVERS WHERE SERVERNAME='OIDLDAPD' ) ) GROUP BY RDN ) ) ) AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'cn' AND AT1.ATTRVAL LIKE 'instance%' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclhostname' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orclconfigsetnumber' AND AT4.ATTRNAME = 'objectclass' AND AT4.ATTRVAL = 'tombstone'

Display.Label: Historical LDAP Entry Cache Hit Ratio

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT DISTINCT INS.ATTRVALUE, PR.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE, AT1.ATTRVAL, AT2.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPPROCESSID PR, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2 WHERE INS.ENTRYID=PR.ENTRYID AND PR.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=INS.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orclecachehitratio' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orclentrydn' AND AT2.ATTRVAL LIKE '%orclhealthstats%' ORDER BY INS.ATTRVALUE, PR.ATTRVALUE, ET.ATTRVALUE

SELECT -- Bug 5757448. If this query returns no rows, return 0 NVL(SUM(ATTRVAL), 0) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclopenconn' AND ATTRSTYPE='tcp'

SELECT -- Bug 5757448. If this query returns no rows, return 0 NVL(SUM(ATTRVAL), 0) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclmetcount' AND ATTRSTYPE='tcpnewconn'

SELECT SUM(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclmetcount' AND ATTRSTYPE='tcpcloseconn'

SELECT SUM(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclqueuedepth' AND ATTRSTYPE='work'

SELECT AVG(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclqueuelatency' AND ATTRSTYPE='work'

SELECT SUM(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclopenconn' AND ATTRSTYPE='db'

SELECT SUM(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclactiveconn' AND ATTRSTYPE='db'

ColumnDescriptor.NAME: numCompletedOps
ColumnDescriptor.COMPUTE_EXPR: numCompletedBindOp + numCompletedAddOp + numCompletedDeleteOp + numCompletedModifyOp + numCompletedSearchOp + numCompletedCompareOp + numCompletedAbandonOp + numCompletedUnbindOp + numCompletedModrdnOp

Display.Label: Total Operations
Display.Description: The total number of operations occured during the last interval

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT -- Bug 5757448. If this query returns no rows, return 0 NVL(SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT2.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT3.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT4.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT5.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT6.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT7.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT8.ATTRVAL), 0), NVL(SUM(AT9.ATTRVAL), 0) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT4, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT5, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT6, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT7, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT8, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT9 WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND OB.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=AT5.ENTRYID AND AT5.ENTRYID=AT6.ENTRYID AND AT6.ENTRYID=AT7.ENTRYID AND AT7.ENTRYID=AT8.ENTRYID AND AT8.ENTRYID=AT9.ENTRYID AND AT9.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE='bind' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE='add' AND AT3.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE='delete' AND AT4.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT4.ATTRSTYPE='modify' AND AT5.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT5.ATTRSTYPE='search' AND AT6.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT6.ATTRSTYPE='compare' AND AT7.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT7.ATTRSTYPE='abandon' AND AT8.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT8.ATTRSTYPE='unbind' AND AT9.ATTRNAME='orclopcompleted' AND AT9.ATTRSTYPE='modrdn' AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclgeneralstats'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2 WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND OB.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orcleventtype' AND AT1.ATTRVAL='super user login' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclopresult' AND AT2.ATTRVAL='success' AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsecrefreshevents'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2 WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND OB.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orcleventtype' AND AT1.ATTRVAL='super user login' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclopresult' AND AT2.ATTRVAL='failure' AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsecrefreshevents'

SELECT AVG(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclserveravgmemgrowth' AND ATTRSTYPE='oid'

SELECT NVL(SUM(ATTRVAL), 0) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsysresourceevents' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclora3113error'

SELECT NVL(SUM(ATTRVAL), 0) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsysresourceevents' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclora3114error'

SELECT ATTRVAL FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsysresourceevents' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclauditmessage'

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT DECODE((ATTRSTYPE), 'termoidproc', 'OID server termination count'), ATTRVAL FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclsysresourceevents' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclmetcount'

SELECT AVG(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclecachehitratio'

SELECT SUM(ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclgeneralstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND ATTRSTYPE = 'bind'

SELECT SUM(DECODE(ATTRVAL, '-1', NULL, ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclinitialservermemsize' AND ATTRSTYPE='oid'

SELECT AVG(DECODE(ATTRVAL, '-1', NULL, ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclserverpercentcpu' AND ATTRSTYPE='oid'

Display.Label: OID Replication Server Virtual Memory Size

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT AVG(DECODE(ATTRVAL, '-1', NULL, ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclinitialservermemsize' AND ATTRSTYPE='repld'

SELECT AVG(DECODE(ATTRVAL, '-1', NULL, ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclhealthstats' ) AND ATTRNAME='orclserverpercentcpu' AND ATTRSTYPE='repld'

SELECT AVG(DECODE((AT1.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT1.ATTRVAL))), AVG(DECODE((AT2.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT2.ATTRVAL))), AVG(DECODE((AT3.ATTRVAL), '-1', NULL, (AT3.ATTRVAL))) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3 WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND OB.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND AT1.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE = 'bind' AND AT2.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE = 'compare' AND AT3.ATTRNAME = 'orcloplatency' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE = 'search_mesg' AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclperfstats'

SELECT UDN.ATTRVALUE, SUM(AT1.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT2.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT3.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT4.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT5.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT6.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT7.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT8.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT9.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT10.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT11.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT12.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT13.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT14.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT15.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT16.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT17.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT18.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT19.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT20.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT21.ATTRVAL), SUM(AT22.ATTRVAL) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLUSERDN UDN, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT4, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT5, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT6, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT7, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT8, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT9, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT10, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT11, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT12, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT13, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT14, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT15, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT16, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT17, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT18, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT19, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT20, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT21, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT22 WHERE UDN.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=AT4.ENTRYID AND AT4.ENTRYID=AT5.ENTRYID AND AT5.ENTRYID=AT6.ENTRYID AND AT6.ENTRYID=AT7.ENTRYID AND AT7.ENTRYID=AT8.ENTRYID AND AT8.ENTRYID=AT9.ENTRYID AND AT9.ENTRYID=AT10.ENTRYID AND AT10.ENTRYID=AT11.ENTRYID AND AT11.ENTRYID=AT12.ENTRYID AND AT12.ENTRYID=AT13.ENTRYID AND AT13.ENTRYID=AT14.ENTRYID AND AT14.ENTRYID=AT15.ENTRYID AND AT15.ENTRYID=AT16.ENTRYID AND AT16.ENTRYID=AT17.ENTRYID AND AT17.ENTRYID=AT18.ENTRYID AND AT18.ENTRYID=AT19.ENTRYID AND AT19.ENTRYID=AT20.ENTRYID AND AT20.ENTRYID=AT21.ENTRYID AND AT21.ENTRYID=AT22.ENTRYID AND AT22.ENTRYID=UDN.ENTRYID AND UDN.ENTRYID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ET.ENTRYID FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLLDAPINSTANCEID INS, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ET, ODS.P1_CT_ORCLHOSTNAME HST, ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB WHERE (TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ET.ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS') > ((SELECT MAX(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ATTRVALUE, 1, 14),'YYYYmmddHH24MISS')) FROM ODS.P1_CT_ORCLEVENTTIME ) - ((SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(ATTRVAL)) FROM ODS.DS_ATTRSTORE WHERE ENTRYID IN (SELECT /*+ INDEX(ODS.CT_DN RP_DN) FIRST_ROWS */ DISTINCT ENTRYID FROM ODS.CT_DN WHERE PARENTDN = 'cn=subregistrysubentry,cn=osdldapd,' AND RDN LIKE 'cn=%' || :1 ) AND ATTRNAME='orclstatsperiodicity') / (24*60) ) ) ) AND ((:2 IS NULL) OR (0 = LENGTH(:2)) OR (INS.ATTRVALUE LIKE ((REPLACE(REPLACE(:2, '_', '\_'), '%', '\%')) || '%') ESCAPE '\') ) AND INS.ENTRYID=ET.ENTRYID AND ET.ENTRYID=HST.ENTRYID AND HST.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND HST.ATTRVALUE=:1 AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orcluserstats' ) AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE='bind' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE='bind' AND AT3.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE='proxybind' AND AT4.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT4.ATTRSTYPE='proxybind' AND AT5.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT5.ATTRSTYPE='unbind' AND AT6.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT6.ATTRSTYPE='compare' AND AT7.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT7.ATTRSTYPE='compare' AND AT8.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT8.ATTRSTYPE='search_base' AND AT9.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT9.ATTRSTYPE='search_base' AND AT10.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT10.ATTRSTYPE='search_one' AND AT11.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT11.ATTRSTYPE='search_one' AND AT12.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT12.ATTRSTYPE='search_sub' AND AT13.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT13.ATTRSTYPE='search_sub' AND AT14.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT14.ATTRSTYPE='add' AND AT15.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT15.ATTRSTYPE='add' AND AT16.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT16.ATTRSTYPE='delete' AND AT17.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT17.ATTRSTYPE='delete' AND AT18.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT18.ATTRSTYPE='modify' AND AT19.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT19.ATTRSTYPE='modify' AND AT20.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT20.ATTRSTYPE='modrdn' AND AT21.ATTRNAME='orclopfailed' AND AT21.ATTRSTYPE='modrdn' AND AT22.ATTRNAME='orclopsucceeded' AND AT22.ATTRSTYPE='abandon' GROUP BY UDN.ATTRVALUE ORDER BY UDN.ATTRVALUE

SELECT DISTINCT AT1.ATTRVAL, AT2.ATTRVAL, AT3.ATTRVAL FROM ODS.P1_CT_OBJECTCLASS OB, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT1, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT2, ODS.P1_DS_ATTRSTORE AT3 WHERE OB.ENTRYID=AT1.ENTRYID AND AT1.ENTRYID=AT2.ENTRYID AND AT2.ENTRYID=AT3.ENTRYID AND AT3.ENTRYID=OB.ENTRYID AND AT1.ATTRNAME='orclsmspec' AND AT1.ATTRSTYPE='dbsrvhost' AND AT2.ATTRNAME='orclsmspec' AND AT2.ATTRSTYPE='dbname' AND AT3.ATTRNAME='orclsmspec' AND AT3.ATTRSTYPE='dbdomain' AND OB.ATTRVALUE='orclgeneralstats'

SELECT server, COUNT(*) FROM ODS.asr_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt = 0 and chg_seq = 0 and server != ( select attrval from ODS.ds_attrstore where entryid = 1 and attrname = 'orclreplicaid' ) group by server

SELECT server, COUNT(*) FROM ODS.asr_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt > 0 and chg_seq = 0 and server != ( select attrval from ODS.ds_attrstore where entryid = 1 and attrname = 'orclreplicaid' ) group by server

SELECT server, COUNT(*) FROM ODS.asr_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt = -1 and chg_seq = 0 and server != ( select attrval from ODS.ds_attrstore where entryid = 1 and attrname = 'orclreplicaid' ) group by server
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.ods_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt != -2 and chg_seq = 0

Display.Label: Total Number ChangeLogs in Purge Queue
Total Number of Local Changelogs in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.ods_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt = -2 AND chg_seq = 0

Display.Label: Total Number Remote ChangeLogs in Purge Queue
Total Number of Remote Changelogs in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.asr_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt = -2 and chg_seq = 0 and server != ( select attrval from ODS.ds_attrstore where entryid = 1 and attrname = 'orclreplicaid' )

Display.Label: Size of Health Statistics Purge Queue
Total Number of Health Statistics Objects in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.p1_ct_dn WHERE parentdn like 'cn=subconfigsubentry,cn=purgeconfig,cn=health stats purgeconfig,%'

Display.Label: Size of General Statistics Purge Queue
Total Number of General Statistics Objects in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.p1_ct_dn WHERE parentdn like 'cn=subconfigsubentry,cn=purgeconfig,cn=general stats purgeconfig,%'

Display.Label: Size of Security Refresh events Purge Queue
Total Number of Security Refresh events Objects in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.p1_ct_dn WHERE parentdn like 'cn=subconfigsubentry,cn=purgeconfig,cn=secrefresh events purgeconfig,%'

Display.Label: Size of System Resource events Purge Queue
Total Number of System Resource events Objects in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.p1_ct_dn WHERE parentdn like 'cn=orclsm,cn=orclsysresourceevents,%'

Display.Label: Size of Audit Log Purge Queue
Total Number of Audit Log Objects in Purge Queue

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.ct_dn WHERE parentdn like 'cn=auditlog,%'

Display.Label: Total Number of Tombstone Objects in Purge Queue
Total number ChangeLogs to be processed

QueryDescriptor.Property: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ODS.asr_chg_log WHERE retry_cnt = 0 and chg_seq = 0 and server != ( select attrval from ODS.ds_attrstore where entryid = 1 and attrname = 'orclreplicaid' )

Display.Label: Number of Change Retry in Replication Process
Number of Threads per Supplier for Change Processing
Number of Threads per Supplier for Transporting Changes
